title: Ambition
text: Advance when you increase your reputation with any faction.

title: Chaos
text: Advance when you topple a tyrannical or dangerously overbearing figure or order.

title: Clean Paws
text: Advance when you accomplish an illicit, criminal goal while maintaining a believable veneer of innocence.

title: Crime
text: Advance when you illicitly scorea significant prize or pull off an illegal caper against impressive odds.

title: Discovery
text: Advance when you encounter a new wonder or ruin in the forests.

title: Freedom
text: Advance when you free a group of denizens from oppression.

title: Greed
text: Advance when you secure a serious payday or treasure.

title: Infamy
text: Advance when you decrease your reputation with any faction.

title: Justice
text: Advance when you achieve justice for someone wronged by a powerful, wealthy, or high-status individual.

title: Loyalty
text: You're loyal to someone; name them. Advance when you obey their order at a great cost to yourself.

title: Principles
text: Advance when you express or embody your moral principles at great cost to yourself or your allies.

title: Protection
text: Name your ward. Advance when you protect them from significant danger, or when time passes and your ward is safe.

title: Revenge
text: Name your foe. Advance when you cause significant harm to them or their interests.

title: Thrills
text: Advance when you escape from certain death or incarceration.

title: Wanderlust
text: Advance when you finish a journey to a clearing.
